items.text: fired full on the stumps, he lunges forward and blocks
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Neesham, no run

items.text: defended back to the bowler again as he plays with his bat close to the body
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Neesham, no run

items.text: turns this gently with the spin to short midwicket
items.postText: Raj Chana: "220 ODI matches with over 8000 runs and an average of just under 50 (better than Williamson), Ross Taylor has to be one of the most underrated cricketers in this generation."
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Taylor, no run

items.text: works it from outside off to midwicket again
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Taylor, no run

items.preText: Kevin: "I have been a big fan of Tom Latham since he came on the scene, but more and more I believe Tom Blundell should be the keeper as he is fair superior behind the stumps. Further, he is a more attacking batsman down the order. If they can't find another spot for Latham, then unfortunately he might have to be out. "
items.text: lunges forward and works it with the spin into the leg side
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Taylor, no run

items.text: legside line, tickles straight to short fine. Pressure building
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Taylor, no run

items.text: gets well forward and turns this to the leg side again
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Taylor, no run

items.text: rolls off a thick inside edge into the leg side as Taylor prods down the wrong line, there's some hesitation with the running but they eventually decide to take a risk. Neesham a split-second late to take off even as Sabbir comes swooping in with a clean pick up and an under-arm flick direct at the striker's end. Bangladesh thought they had their man, but replays confirm Neesham has been saved by a frame. Very, very close. Nervy moments.
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Taylor, 1 run

items.text: struck on the pad as he looks to hoick across the line, impact outside leg.
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Taylor, no run

items.text: turns this wide of midwicket, towards the man in the deep
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Taylor, 1 run

items.text: punched to extra cover
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Neesham, no run

items.text: steered with the spin ointo the gap between cover and point
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Neesham, 1 run

items.text: full on middle and leg, defended to short midwicket
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Taylor, no run

items.text: quicker one on the pads, nudged towards the an running in from deep square leg. Risky but they make it eventually
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Taylor, 2 runs

items.preText: Mid-on goes back to the rope
items.text: drifts into his hitting arc and he's clobbered this over wide long-on! That will relieve some pressure
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Neesham, SIX runs

items.text: gets well forward and blocks
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Neesham, no run

items.text: bunts this down to long-on
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Neesham, 1 run

items.text: gets half-forward and nudges this to short midwicket
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Taylor, 1 run

items.text: driven back, good stop by Mehidy off his own bowling, parried it to cover
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Neesham, no run

items.text: keeps a touch low as he rocks back to cut, hit straight to the fielder
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Neesham, no run

items.text: eases this down to long-on
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Taylor, 1 run

items.text: rocks back and cuts to short third man
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Neesham, no run

items.text: hoicked across the line, not timed as well as he would've liked but it trickles to the midwicket boundary
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Neesham, FOUR runs

items.preText: Neesham trying to impose himself. Happy to take risks, even if it means hitting against the turn
items.text: makes room and crunches to sweeper cover
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Neesham, 1 run

items.text: looks to drill this through cover but gets a thick outside edge, races past short third man, two men in pursuit and they squeeze through for a third. Lucky runs, can't really call that a chance
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Taylor, FOUR runs
